_header: Saint Matthew in our gospel shows
Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 4712.
_description: Gospel for the Eighteenth Sunday after Trinity in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Saynte mathew in oure gospel saiseþat þe Iewes þat
                    wyse ware of te lawes…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…And if ȝe will ȝe may hereA litil tale of þis
                    matere
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Matheu In vr gospel schowesþat Iewes wise weoren holden
                    in lawes…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And ȝif ȝe wole ȝe may hereA luytel tale of
                    þis Matere
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
SEynt Matheu telles vs in his saweÞat iewes þat were wyse
                    men of lawe…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…And if ȝe wille ȝe may nowe hereA litel tale of
                    þis matere
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica xviiia post festum trinitatis secundum Mathium
                    (p. 311)

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt mathew telliþ in his saweþat iewis þat were
                    wise men of lawewere gaderid manye in a stede…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…and if ȝe wile ȝe may now herea litil tale of
                    þis matere
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Dominica xviii post festum sancte trinitatis Euangelium secundum
                        Matheum (f. 194)

CULGg531.First Lines:
Seynt matheu in oure gospel shawesþat iewes þat wys war
                    of lawes…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…And if ȝe wyll ȝe may hereA lytell tale of þis
                    mater

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
SEint Matheu In vr gospel schewesÞat Iewes wis were holden in
                    lawes…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…And ȝif ȝe wol ȝe may hereA luytel tale of
                    þis Matere
BLAdd22283.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library MS Add. 22283 (‘Simeon’).

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Saynt mathewe in owre gospell schewesÞat þe Jowes
                    þat wyse were of þe lawes…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…And yf ȝe may hereA lytyll tayel of þis
                    maudre

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynte Mathew in oure gospell schewesþat þe Iewes ware
                    wyse halden in þer lawes…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…þer oure lorde cryste whare he es kyngfor hys mercy he
                    þider vs bryng

HunHM129.First Lines:
Seint mathew in oure gospell schawisÞat iowis þat wise
                    ware holdyn in lowys…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…And ȝyff ȝe will ȝe may hereA lytill tale off
                    þis matere
